title: Highest Fertilizer Consumption
description: In 2022, Estonia's fertilizer consumption was 22973.71% of its fertilizer production, the highest in the world.

title: Lowest CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: Estonia had the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste, at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023.

title: Lowest Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2021, Estonia had only 1 patent application by nonresidents, the lowest globally.
